Docs.param: The Xbox User ID of the player to get statistics for.
The service configuration ID for the service holding the statistic.
The name of the statistic to return.
Docs.summary: Get a specified statistic for a specified user.
Docs.returns: An interface for tracking the progress of the asynchronous call. The result is the requested statistic.

Docs.param: The Xbox User ID of the player requesting the subscription.
The service configuration ID (SCID) of the subscription.
The name of the statistic to subscribe to.
Docs.summary: Subscribes to statistic update notifications via the StatisticChanged event.
Docs.returns: A subscription object that contains the state of the subscription. You can register an event handler for statistic changes by using the StatisticChanged event.
